entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Campbellton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:54 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Charlo 04:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 53 %

Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this morning. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 20 except minus 28 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then clearing. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 20 except minus 28 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 19 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 12 except minus 16 in low lying areas.
